basics.name: Jaehyun Park
basics.label: Deep Learning Researcher
basics.summary: A Ph.D. candidate in Data Mining Lab @ KAIST, specializing in data-efficient deep learning.

education.institution: Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST)
Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST)

work.name: IBS Data Science Group
work.summary: Research on Technical Progress in Social Activities. Utilizing meetup.com dataset for longitudinal studies tracing the changes in contents and descriptions of a specific type of social activities driven by technological environment.

work.name: Boostcamp AI Tech
work.summary: I got a chance to study in a coding camp to experience End-to-End AI production process. I was able to learn to define tasks and implement various neural network architectures via PyTorch. I participated in image classification, semantic segmentation, object detection, model optimization competitions and develop my knowledge.

work.name: SK Hynix Information Sensor Technology
work.summary: Participated in the investigation of depth-sensing error dependency on demodulation contrast.

awards.title: Dean's List

publications.name: Active Learning for Continual Learning: Keeping the Past Alive in the Present
